info.title: Example API with RBAC/ABAC authorization
info.description: This is an example API written in Typescript and features authentication and authorization

200.description: New user record with ID

get.summary: Activates user and logs them in if valid, redirecting to configured URL

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: JWT token received in email link

200.description: User record and JWT auth token that expires in 1 hour

post.summary: Authenticates user and generates new JWT auth token

200.description: User record and JWT auth token that expires in 1 hour

post.summary: Emails new magic link to log user in if found

200.description: Confirmation and prompt to check email (TODO)

post.summary: Authenticates as surrogate user and generates new JWT auth token

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of user to impersonate

200.description: User record and JWT auth token that expires in 1 hour

post.summary: Disables user token from subsequent access

200.description: Success flag

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of token that needs deleted

200.description: Confirmation of successful operation
A list of roles (optionally with nested permissions if allowed)

delete.summary: Deletes specific role permission if exists

parameters.name: permissionId
parameters.description: ID of permission that needs deleted

get.summary: Event log viewing for monitoring and troubleshooting

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: query parameters to filter records

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max records to return per request (default 10)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: record offset for pagination

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: limit date range (starting point until 'to')

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: limit date range (if empty default to now)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: which field(s) to sort by and what order

200.description: A list of events logged by the application

get.summary: Search by places using opencagedata service

200.description: OK

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Specifies the query string

200.description: A successful status code to indicate app is running
